translated: The Discussion of the Distribution of the Relics
The Victorious One, the Great Gotama,
one in the city of Vesālī;
One in Pāvā, in the Mallian country,

analyzed: ekaḥ ca kosinārake  kumbhassa thūpam kāresi

translated: The brahmin Doṇa, the son of Savhiya,🔽had a stūpa made for the urn,
and the Moriyas, with delighted minds,🔽had a stūpa made for the embers.
There were eight bodily relic stūpas,
the ninth was the urn stūpa;
The ember stūpa was the tenth,
which was established at that time.
